welcome: Hello and welcome to your interview. I'm an AI interviewer, and I'll be conducting your initial screening today. Feel free to ask me questions at any time.
introduction: Let's start with a brief introduction. Could you please tell me about yourself?

questions.text: Could you walk me through your relevant experience for this position?
What interests you about this role and our company?
What are your key technical skills and how have you applied them?
Can you describe a challenging project you worked on and how you handled it?
How do you prefer to work within a team?

closing.invitation: Do you have any questions for me about the role or company?
closing.signoff: Thank you for your time today. We'll be in touch with next steps soon.
